DOC.brief_summary: Hypothesis : Daily use AVACEN Thermal Exchange System 4 week show improved Fibromyalgia pain function marker , assess biomarkers clinical psychological assessment . This non-invasive device able rapidly raise core body temperature user place hand vacuum chamber rest upon heat element . The change body temperature may change sympathetic nervous system 's activity thereby reduce Fibromyalgia pain .
DOC.brief_title: Investigation AVACEN Thermal Exchange System Fibromyalgia Pain
